00257 /* Exported constants --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00258 /** @defgroup MIDI_Exported_Constants MIDI exported constants
00259   * @{
00260   */
00261 /* Definitions of MIDI_FLAG                                                                                 */
00262 #define MIDI_FLAG_INTF        0x0001
00263 
00264 /* Definitions of MIDI_INT                                                                                  */
00265 #define MIDI_INT_INTEN        0x0001
00266 #define MIDI_INT_MIDII_DMAEN  0x0002
00267 #define MIDI_INT_MIDIO_DMAEN  0x0004
00268 
00269 /* Definitions of MIDI_VOL                                                                                  */
00270 #define VOL_MAX  0
00271 #define VOL_MID  0x1FF
00272 #define VOL_380  0x380
00273 #define VOL_MIN  0x3FF
00274 #define VOL_MUTE VOL_MIN
00275 
00276 //#define IS_MIDI(x) ((MIDI == HT_MIDI))
00277 #define IS_MIDI(x) ((x == HT_MIDI))
00278 
00279 #define IS_MIDI_INT(x)        (((x & 0xFFFFFFF8) == 0x0) && (x != 0))
00280 #define IS_MIDI_FLAG(x)       (x == MIDI_FLAG_INTF)
00281 #define IS_MIDI_FLAG_CLEAR(x) (((x & 0xFFFFFFFE) == 0) && (x != 0))
00282 
00283 #define IS_MIDI_CTRL_MCUCHEN3(x)    ((x == MCUCHEN3_OFF) || (x == MCUCHEN3_ON))
00284 #define IS_MIDI_CTRL_MCUCHEN2(x)    ((x == MCUCHEN2_OFF) || (x == MCUCHEN2_ON))
00285 #define IS_MIDI_CTRL_MCUCHEN1(x)    ((x == MCUCHEN1_OFF) || (x == MCUCHEN1_ON))
00286 #define IS_MIDI_CTRL_MCUCHEN0(x)    ((x == MCUCHEN0_OFF) || (x == MCUCHEN0_ON))
00287 #define IS_MIDI_CTRL_DACDS(x)       (x < 8)
00288 #define IS_MIDI_CTRL_MUSICEN(x)     ((x == MUSICEN_OFF) || (x == MUSICEN_ON))
00289 #define IS_MIDI_CTRL_SPIRDEN(x)     ((x == SPIRDEN_OFF) || (x == SPIRDEN_ON))
00290 #define IS_MIDI_CTRL_SPIDISLOOP(x)  ((x == SPIDISLOOP_OFF) || (x == SPIDISLOOP_ON))
00291 #define IS_MIDI_CTRL_CHS(x)         (x < 8)
00292 
00293 #define IS_MIDI_FREQ_BL(x)    (x < 12)
00294 #define IS_MIDI_FREQ_FR(x)    (x < 0xFFF)
00295 
00296 #define IS_MIDI_VOL_AR(x)     (ENV_ATTACK || ENV_RELEASE)
00297 #define IS_MIDI_VOL_ENV(x)    (ENV_TYPE0 || ENV_TYPE1 || ENV_TYPE2 || ENV_NO)
00298 #define IS_MIDI_VOL_VL(x)     (x < 0x3FF)
00299 #define IS_MIDI_VOL_VR(x)     (x < 0x3FF)
00300 
00301 #define IS_MIDI_STADDR(x)     (x < 0x7FFFF)
00302 
00303 #define IS_MIDI_RENUM_WBS(x)  ((x == WBS8) || (x == WBS12) || (x == WBS16))
00304 #define IS_MIDI_RENUM_RE(x)   (x < 0x7FFF)
00305 
00306 #define IS_MIDI_ENDADDR(x)    (x < 0xFFFFFF)
00307 
00308 #define IS_MIDI_CHAN_ST(x)    ((x == ST_OFF) || (x == ST_ON))
00309 #define IS_MIDI_CHAN_VM(x)    ((x == VM_OFF) || (x == VM_ON))
00310 #define IS_MIDI_CHAN_FR(x)    ((x == FR_OFF) || (x == FR_ON))
00311 #define IS_MIDI_CHAN_CHx(x)   (x < 32)
00312 
00313 #define IS_MIDI_MCUCHx11_BH(x)    (x < 0xFFFF)
00314 #define IS_MIDI_MCUCHx11_BL(x)    (x < 0xFFFF)
00315 
00316 #define IS_MIDI_MCUCHx12_CH(x)    (x < 0xFFFF)
00317 #define IS_MIDI_MCUCHx12_CL(x)    (x < 0xFFFF)
00318 
00319 #define IS_MIDI_MCUCHx13_DH(x)    (x < 0xFFFF)
00320 #define IS_MIDI_MCUCHx13_DL(x)    (x < 0xFFFF)
00321 
00322 #define IS_MIDI_MCUCHx14_EH(x)    (x < 0xFFFF)
00323 #define IS_MIDI_MCUCHx14_EL(x)    (x < 0xFFFF)
00324 /**
00325   * @}
00326   */
